name: The Castle's Many Secrets
description: A group of delinquent students gathers at Hagrid's Hut for their detention. The gamekeeper has an important task for them to complete.

sub_quests.name: Meet Hagrid at the gamekeeper's hut to serve out your detention.
Enter the Forbidden Forest to investigate the mysterious happenings within.
Search for more information about this mysterious shadow.
Find a way into Slytherin's lost study.
Visit Professor Dumbledore in his office.
